website_summaries.verdict: The DJI Mavic Mini is a lightweight drone that you don't have to register, but spotty connectivity makes it hard to recommend wholeheartedly.
cons: Doesn't support Raw or HDR images

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!! A quality light filter set.
customer_reviews.text: Waited until I tried them out as I've had problems with other filters from different brands but these are great. The metal clips are super light but strong. The glass is really clear so you can tell the quality is good (I usually use tiffen on my cinema cameras) and gives you a clean image. No gimbal errors or shake so I'm super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Avoid. The quality of these is below acceptable. Two of the filters had dodgy hooks for attaching to the gimbal. The others caused the humble to judder and shake.
customer_reviews.author: HENNY VENOM

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter lens kit for the Mavic Mini. Just as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality at a decent price. I have occasionally had gimbal issues but not reliably. Good range of filter exposures and all well organised in a little case.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Peter Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Simple hook in. Worked wonders on my trip. Top quality filters, nice little case too. All feels like amazing quality. Well worth it and worked like a charm! Videos and photos came out stunning!!
customer_reviews.author: SUPERKING_

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very well made lenses.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality lenses, very well made and perfectly fit my Mavic Mini. Only negative is that they can be a bit fiddly to get off the gimbal after a flight, however the cover fits with these in place so not much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well manufactured and does what it says on the tin .. recommend it for every mavic mini owner
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and clear
customer_reviews.text: These little gimbal nd filters are light and clear adding to the exposure of the images. very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: A. du Toit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It’s really great quality and it fits perfectly to you’re drone camera. I recommend this to everyone. Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vinko

customer_reviews.title: Mavic mini
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and also do not put the drone over the 250g limit to redister it
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use these yet but they feel sturdy and for well on the gimbal
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good set of ND filters
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this for the mavic mini a lot... It could be improved but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality filter
customer_reviews.text: Good quality nd filter for my mavic mini.. It really helped improve the cinematic look to my drone footages. Exactly what i need.
customer_reviews.author: darby

customer_reviews.title: Pack of 5ND filters
customer_reviews.text: The case is suitable for 6 filters, but only 5 are included (ND4, ND8, ND16, ND32 and ND64). There is also a cleaning cloth included. The metal clips are light and strong. They allows easy attaching - harrower this process needs gentle hands in order to avoid to scratch the MINI's camera. No issue due to extra weight at gimbal initialization. Lens flare is reduced, but not totally eliminated. In super strong day light you will need higher ND values Pros Lightweight, less than 1 gram; Easy to attach and remove; Set of 5 different ND values; Cons Quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: FirstQuadcopter

product_meta.title: SKYREAT Camera Lens ND Filters Set 6 Pack-(CPL, UV,ND8, ND16, ND32, ND64) Compatible with DJI Mavic Mini Camera
feature_bullets: Filter specifically made for the DJI mavic mini Camera.
Multi-coated glass for pristine optics,reduced lens flaring.
Aircraft aluminum construction-lightweight gimbal safe design.
Filter can be left on during mavic mini startup. Does not affect gimbal calibration.
Mavic mini filter set includes CPL, UV,ND8, ND16, ND32, ND64

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
